title: Women and Oasis Make Music Big in the UK in 2025
summary: In 2025, female artists like Taylor Swift, Olivia Dean, and Lola Young helped sell and stream more music in the UK than ever before. Taylor Swift's new album was the biggest seller, and other women had hit songs too. Oasis, a band from the past, also sold many albums because they went on a big tour again. Most music is listened to through streaming, where playing songs many times counts as sales. The British Phonographic Industry shared these numbers, showing that music is very popular. It was a great year for new female singers in the UK, with Olivia Dean making history by having a number one song and album at the same time.

background_read: Music in the UK is often measured by sales and streaming, where playing songs online many times helps count towards popularity. In 2025, female artists like Taylor Swift, who is very famous worldwide, led the charts with new albums and songs. Oasis, a band that was popular in the 1990s, came back with a tour that made people buy their music again. Streaming services like Spotify allow fans to listen to music easily, and groups like the British Phonographic Industry track these numbers to see what music is most loved.

WHAT: They drove music sales and streaming to record levels in the UK in 2025
WHY: Because new female talent emerged and Oasis had a reunion tour, making music more popular
